Target: OntoBatchExperiment is an ontology to represent batch experiments and relevant information.

Comment: A role assigned to a person who will be responsible for managing and conducting batch processes in a controlled environment.
Label: Operator

Comment: A type of experiment or process in which a fixed quantity of materials is processed together in a single batch or lot.
Label: Batch experiment

Comment: A substance or compound that is used in a chemical reaction or analysis to detect, measure, or synthesize other substances.
Label: Reagent

Comment: A unique identifier assigned to a batch experiment that is derived from other types of information (e.g. work code, batch number, initials).
Label: Identifier

Comment: A confidential internal identifier assigned to a batch experiment.
Label: Work code

Comment: A number assigned to a batch experiment.
Label: Batch number

Comment: The initials of a person are the first letters of their first name and last name (and sometimes middle name).
Label: Initials

Comment: A relationship to describe an identifier being derived from other types of information.
Label: is derived from

Comment: A relationship between a batch experiment and it's operator.
Label: is operated by

Comment: A relationship between a batch experiment and it's start time.
Label: has start time

Comment: A relationship between a batch experiment and it's end time.
Label: has end time

Comment: A relationship between a batch experiment and the reagent used in the experiment.
Label: has reagent

Comment: A relationship between a reagent and it's amount of substance concentration.
Label: has amount of substance concentration

Comment: A relationship between a reagent and it's mass fraction.
Label: has mass fraction

Comment: A relationship that describes the identifier allocated to a batch experiment.
Label: has identifier

Comment: A relationship that describes the work code allocated to a batch experiment.
Label: has work code

Comment: A relationship that describes the batch number allocated to a batch experiment.
Label: has batch number

Comment: A relationship that describes a person's initials.
Label: has initials

Comment: A relationship that describes notes taken by the operator for the batch experiment.
Label: has operator notes
